data.event: According to the World Health Organisation (WHO), a cholera epidemic in the African country of Zimbabwe has now infected over 80,200 people.

event.title: the worst cholera outbreak in Africa for fifteen years

data.event: The epidemic is the worst cholera outbreak in Africa for fifteen years.

event.title: began in August of last year

data.event: Since the outbreak began in August of last year, over 80,000 people have been infected and 3,759 people have died from the disease in Zimbabwe as of February 19.
That compared with 3,172 deaths out of 78,882 cases that were recorded as of Tuesday.
